altername_name: Kids Station: Unten Daisuki: Doki doki Norimono Daibouken
name: Kids Station: Unten Daisuki: Doki Doki Norimono Daibouken
overview: Kids Station Unten Daisuki: Doki Doki Norimono Daibouken is a collection of mini games in which the player controls different characters (a policeman, a boy or a girl) depending of the mini game against an evil professor that will try to win them. The mini games are driving different vehicles (like a crane, car, firemen truck, plane, helicopter, etc), defeat a gang or evil guys, build differen vehicles using different parts in a factory or fish using a boat.
